description: NOVICA works together with talented artists, artisans, and designers around the world to produce stunning, keepsake handmade treasures. Our mantra is to Spread Happiness, so rest assured - we’ll do everything we possibly can to ensure you’re a happy customer!About this item: Deep purple gemstones bring a special allure to these glamorous earrings. Handcrafted of sterling silver, they feature faceted amethysts and richly-veined composite turquoise. From India's Neeru Goel, the pair is enchanting.About our Artist: Neeru Goel inherited her passion for jewelry from her grandmother. 'My grandmother would look into each and every detail, from how jewelry is made to the materials. It feels great to see my designs being admired by other people.'...
